channel.title: physics.hist-ph updates on arXiv.org
channel.description: physics.hist-ph updates on the arXiv.org e-print archive.

item.title: Where are the bits in atoms? A perspective on the physical origin and evolutionary nature of information
item.description: arXiv:2407.09567v4 Announce Type: replace-cross Abstract: Information is a structural pattern that represents another structural pattern. This perspective hypothesizes that modelling of structure creation through causal sets can elucidate the natural origin, evolution and ontology of information.
item.dc:creator: Wouter van der Wijngaart
